definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
double/twice/simultaneous/holding two or more (official) posts at the same time

sentences.english: A visitor took photos of the candlelit miniature Kamakura, or snow huts, on Monday during the Kamakura Snow Festival in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 一名遊客在日本鎌倉冰雪節的微型鎌倉前拍照流年。

sentences.english: In addition, Kamakura's sand beaches attract large crowds during the summer months.
sentences.chinese: 此外，鎌倉夏日的沙灘也吸引着大量遊客。

definition: archaic variant of 櫪|枥, oak/type of tree in ancient books/stable (for horses)
to borrow/to buy on credit/to rent out
